abstract: Obama administration's release of data related to counterterrorism drone strikes reveals complications and limitations of drone program; statistics reveal number of civilian deaths, along with uncertainty within government about whom it has killed, even as terrorist attacks escalate outside of host countries.

headline.print_headline: Drone Strike Data Reveals Limits of Fighting Terrorists From Sky
headline.main: Drone Strike Statistics Answer Few Questions, and Raise Many

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The Obama administration’s release of the civilian death toll from targeted drone attacks revealed an uncertainty about whom it had killed....
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration’s release of the civilian death toll from targeted drone attacks revealed an uncertainty about whom it had killed.
